bluebird.layersÂ¶

Modules

bluebird.layers.dense

Dense layer, Combination of linear and activation layer

bluebird.layers.dropout

Droput layer, randomly sets input units to 0

bluebird.layers.flatten

Flatten layer, Designed for flattening matrix of n rows and m columns to n*m array

bluebird.layers.input

Basic input layer Designed for specifing number of input neurons All other preprocessing input layers inherit Input layer

bluebird.layers.layer

Basic layer arhitecture All other layers and activations inherit this basic arhitecture

bluebird.layers.linear

Basic linear layer
